examples.korean: The preview was intended to whet your appetite. 발음듣기 그 예고편은 당신의 욕구를 자극하기 위한 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The preview was intended to whet your appetite. 발음

examples.korean: The exhibition has stimulated interest in her work. 발음듣기 그 전시회가 그녀의 작품에 대한 관심을 자극했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The exhibition has stimulated interest in her work. 발음

examples.korean: Try not to excite your baby too much before bedtime. 발음듣기 아기를 재우기 전에는 너무 자극하지 않도록 하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Try not to excite your baby too much before bedtime. 발음

examples.korean: The animals were conditioned to respond to auditory stimuli. 발음듣기 그 동물들은 청각적 자극에 조건 반사를 일으키도록 되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The animals were conditioned to respond to auditory stimuli. 발음
